metadata.shortInfo: This track shows SNPs from the The Million Mutation Project (Waterston/Moerman). The color of the SNP represents its potental effect on a gene. Green indicates a possible missense; red a possible nonsense; blue a frameshift; yellow a disruption of a coding exon(s); and white for everything else.

style.label: function(f) {var name = f.get('public_name'); var other_name = f.get('other_name'); if (typeof other_name === 'undefined') {return name;} return name+'-'+other_name; }
